Package uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui

Class Summary
CheckoutPanel Panel contained by pop-up window that appears when user clicks "PAY" button.
DatePicker Simple JPanel with JSpinner, that allows user to pick a date.
ItemButtonsPanel Panel constisting of buttons representing each item to sell (StoreItemButton).
MainFrame Main Frame of the application.
MainMenuBar Represents menu bar from main frame.
OrderItemPanel A panel that contains single order item.
OrderItemsListPanel Panel that contains OrderItemPanels, i.
OrderPanel Panel that is displayed in left part of the screen, contains all information concerning current order.
PreviousOrdersLoader A thread, where previous orders are loaded to the PreviousOrdersPanel.
PreviousOrdersPanel Panel responsible for showing previous orders.
PreviousOrdersSettingsPanel Panel shown on the right side of PreviousOrders screen.
ReceiptPanel A panel that contains the receipt.
RunApp Start point for the application.
StoreItemButton Button representing one item for sale.
StorePanel Panel displayed on the right side of Till screen.
